name: Quaquaval
flavorText: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.

previous.name: Quaxwell
previous.flavorText: These Pokémon constantly run through shallow waters to train their legs, then compete with each other to see which of them kicks most gracefully.

next.name: Lechonk
next.flavorText: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging.

pokemon.name: Quaxly
pokemon.flavorText: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime."
